constant_deprecated_color.comment: These colours are deprecated from CSS color module level 3 http://www.w3.org/TR/css3-color/#css2-system
constant_deprecated_color.name: invalid.deprecated.color.system.css.scss

constant_rgb_percentage.match:
(?x)
(?<!scale3d\(|translate3d\(|rotate3d\() # scale3d, translate3d, and rotate3d don't use RGB percentages
\b
([0-9]{1,2}|100)\s*(%)
\s*(,)\s*
([0-9]{1,2}|100)\s*(%)
\s*(,)\s*
([0-9]{1,2}|100)\s*(%)

patterns.comment: Kuroir: fixed nested elements for sass.

property_name.comment: Reversal order is important; KEEP IT. Also when adding new properties add them to the error checker below!
property_name.name: support.type.property-name.scss

property_values.comment: Stuff that should only be available on values.
